content: Today at bus, I'd wanted to do an annotation but without using the phone. It would be possible with glasses with transparent graphen chips that reads fingerprints and uses the bus` Internet. User writes something at the glasses (also with a touchscreen display), it reads the fingerprint, and at any time the user can request the annotations using finger on phone. If you have a debouched mind, you will say it is a very complex technology for an useless application; but if you see wider, it can enable lots of useful use cases. "But when this tech is available, there will be no public buses on streets", but this tech is already available but hidden by ignorance on productions. #PostWithIdea 26/02/19 20:55 #BB
